class.name: Phaser.Physics.P2.FixtureList
class.help:
Allow to access a list of created fixture (coming from Body#addPhaserPolygon)
which itself parse the input from PhysicsEditor with the custom phaser exporter.
You can access fixtures of a Body by a group index or even by providing a fixture Key.

You can set the fixture key and also the group index for a fixture in PhysicsEditor.
This gives you the power to create a complex body built of many fixtures and modify them
during runtime (to remove parts, set masks, categories & sensor properties)

public.name: flatten
public.help: A helper to flatten arrays. This is very useful as the fixtures are nested from time to time due to the way P2 creates and splits polygons.

parameters.name: array
parameters.help: The array to flatten. Notice: This will happen recursive not shallow.

public.name: getFixtureByKey
public.help: Accessor to get either a single fixture by its key.

public.name: getFixtures
public.help: Accessor to get either a list of specified fixtures by key or the whole fixture list

public.name: getGroup
public.help: Accessor to get a group of fixtures by its group index.

public.name: parse
public.help: Parser for the output of Phaser.Physics.P2.Body#addPhaserPolygon

parameters.name: bit
parameters.help: The bit to set as the collision group.

parameters.name: fixtureKey
parameters.help: Only apply to the fixture with the given key.

parameters.name: bit
parameters.help: The bit to set as the collision mask

parameters.name: fixtureKey
parameters.help: Only apply to the fixture with the given key

parameters.name: material
parameters.help: The contact material for a fixture

parameters.name: fixtureKey
parameters.help: Only apply to the fixture with the given key

parameters.name: fixtureKey
parameters.help: Only apply to the fixture with the given key

private.name: allFixtures
private.inlineHelp: This is a list of everything in this collection

private.name: groupedFixtures
private.inlineHelp: Collect all given fixtures per group index. Notice: Every fixture with a key also belongs to a group

private.name: namedFixtures
private.inlineHelp: Collect all fixtures with a key
